parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.60</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the team the unit belongs to. Possible values:

* <tt>"MAIN"</tt> (default and white)
* <tt>"RED"</tt>
* <tt>"GREEN"</tt>
* <tt>"BLUE"</tt>
* <tt>"YELLOW"</tt>
* <tt>""</tt> if given unit is [[objNull]] or [[remoteControl]]ing another unit(Since Arma 3 v1.93.145625) </value></part><part><name/>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''assignedTeam''' unitName </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] (or, prior to Arma 3 v1.93.145625, [[Nothing]] if given unit is [[objNull]] or [[remoteControl]]ing another unit) </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_team <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''assignedTeam''' [[player]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[assignTeam]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part></template>
